function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation in built environments","Impact":"Health risks, spread of illness, and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce close contact, improving ventilation systems, and using proper sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV germicidal lamps, smart ventilation systems","People":"Residents, visitors, workers, and community members","Owner":"Architects, builders, property managers, and local health authorities"}]}
